talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Oh, Link!


You rescued our precious King Sidon<sp:5:0:0> and
saved the entire domain!

On behalf of the King Sidon fan club,
thank you so much for all that you have
done for the Zora!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Now that all of that awfulness is settled,<sp:5:0:0>
we can finally get back to what matters—
discussing how wonderful King Sidon is!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_01>The sludge!<sp:5:0:0> That ghastly sludge!


<snd:Sad_01>My friend Tona was buried in the stuff.<sp:5:0:0>
Thankfully she was rescued, but she is
covered in that muck even still.
The look of suffering on her face when
they carried her to the infirmary...<sp:5:0:0>
I fear we will all end up like that.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Oh, my sweet prince...<sp:5:0:0> If only I could have
spoken with you Zora-to-Zora just once
before the final curtain!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Oh, Link!


You rescued our precious King Sidon<sp:5:0:0> and
saved the entire domain!

On behalf of the King Sidon fan club,
thank you so much for all that you have
done for the Zora!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Now that all of that awfulness is settled,
we can finally get back to what matters—
discussing how wonderful King Sidon is!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease_00>*siiigh* <sp:5:0:0>I simply can't stop sighing.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>I've been<sp:5:0:0> staring at the throne room...<sp:5:1:0>
I mean, <sp:5:0:0>protecting the throne room...
for ages now.
<snd:Think_01>But these days, I never catch sight of
Prince Sidon!

I know that he is doing some kind of
important work at Mipha Court, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* I would even brave a bit of sludge
for just a momentary peek at our prince!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>I finished my training for today.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I did a lot of imagination training, so I'm
sure I will be able to meet King Sidon in
my dreams!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Sorry, but please excuse me.<sp:5:0:0> I have a
dream date with King Sidon soon, so I
must get to sleep at once.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I hear that Prince Sidon is going on
some kind of trip. Into the sky, if I
heard correctly.
That makes this the perfect time <sp:5:1:0>for the
Prince Sidon fan club<sp:5:0:0> to help Lady Yona,
who will be all alone while he's away!
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease_00>It's too bad that Tona is still recuperating<sp:5:0:0>
and Laruta is obsessed with figuring out
what the Zora children are up to.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>I know I'm the president of our club and
all, but...<sp:5:1:0>without anyone to preside over,
all I can do is fold my fins in prayer.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>The King Sidon fan-club meeting is going
to start without me if I don't hurry.

It is unacceptable for the president to
be tardy!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>When the sludge first started falling,<sp:5:0:0>
King Sidon started cleaning the domain
at once.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:SurpriseS_01>He secured a fresh water source for us
all by himself...

<sp:3:0:2:0000>He handled the investigation of the
stone slate...

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>He vanquished the sludge monster that
appeared at Mipha Court...

<sp:3:0:2:0000>AND he journeyed into the sky itself to
stop the sludge at its source!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>What a hero! What admirable deeds!


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>We truly could never praise him enough...<sp:5:1:0>
but endeavoring to do just that is the
prime mission of the King Sidon fan club!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Tired_01>How fun that the children are playing a
secret game in the throne room.

It kind of seems like they're pretending to
be King Dorephan. I'm curious as to what
sort of things they're speaking about...
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>So...<sp:5:0:0>I've been thinking.


<sp:3:0:2:0800>Everyone in the King Sidon fan club
should strive to re-create the experience
of King Sidon's adventure for ourselves.
By that I mean, we must swim to the
ruins in the sky!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will play the role of King Sidon, though
his fins are impossible to fill, of course.
And Tona will play as you, Link.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Laruta will play our fair Queen Yona. This
is an important undertaking! Ah, but that
means she can't leave the domain...
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_01>It looks like Tona is on the mend!


I'm sooo happy! What a relief!


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Not even the sludge has the power to
break up the Prince Sidon fan club!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive_01>I, Tula, <sp:5:0:0>president of the Prince Sidon fan
club,<sp:5:1:0> will pray with all of my heart,<sp:5:0:0> for the
salvation of the domain!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_00>Correct. <sp:5:0:0>They insist their game is a secret
and won't allow any adults to get near.

They say <clr:0000>King Dorephan <clr:ffff>himself told them
not to tell anybody.

<snd:Sad_01>I must know what the secret is!


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal_00>After all, if it truly is about <clr:0000>King Dorephan<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
I'm sure Prince Sidon would want to be
privy as well.
If I catch wind of something,<sp:5:0:0> I could use it
as an excuse to talk to...<sp:5:1:0> I mean, <sp:5:0:0>I could
dutifully tell Prince Sidon about it!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Hm. <sp:5:1:0>But even when I accidentally stray
near there,<sp:5:0:0> they quickly shoo me away.

Ledo was merely cleaning the throne
room, and he was chased out as well.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I wonder if there's any way to covertly
listen in on their game...
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>OK... <sp:5:0:0>Be safe out there.


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>Ugh, I really need to know what this
King Dorephan game is all about...
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>We will probably all become sullied
and meet our end because of that
awful sludge!
<snd:Tired_01>Oh, my sweet Prince Sidon...<sp:5:0:0> If only I
could have spoken with you Zora-to-Zora
just once before the final curtain!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Tired_01>Maybe I should just mosey over to
Mipha Court for a bit. You know,
see how he's doing.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh, who am I kidding... <sp:5:0:0>I have no
believable reason to speak with him.
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>They're pretending to be King Dorephan
in the throne room.<sp:5:1:0> I would be lying if I
said I wasn't curious about their game.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>Hmmm. <sp:5:0:0>Come to think of it...


<sp:3:0:2:0000>You are in a very enviable position.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You were graced with the opportunity<sp:5:0:0> to
journey with King Sidon to that place...

<sp:3:0:2:0000>You have spent quality with him here...


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>And there as well...


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>Do not get me wrong,<sp:5:0:0> I am not saying I'm
jealous or anything. I'm just...<sp:5:1:0>envious.<sp:5:0:0>
It's different! Really!
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>It's not just Tona either. The Zora
soldiers are in much better shape
as well.
Lady Yona did incredible work, as always!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease_00>I was thinking about King Sidon.


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>And got so absorbed, <sp:5:0:0>I couldn't sleep.


<sp:3:0:2:0300>I mostly just wander around at night.<sp:5:0:0>
I am essentially a nocturnal creature at
this point.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Dear Prince Sidon...<sp:5:0:0>and kind Lady Yona...


<snd:Ease_00>Oh, please, please, please... <sp:5:0:0>I pray for
their safety and that of Zora's Domain!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Ease_00>King Sidon...<sp:5:0:0> He really is sooo noble.
And handsome. So handsome it's noble,
in fact.
*sigh* I really need to discuss this
important point with the other members
of the King Sidon fan club...
